column4: hello i am about to install ubuntu 9.04 64bit, i want to have separate partitions for: /home /usr /var /boot and /tmp what size should i make these partitions? i have a 160gb sata drive.
Dr_willis, i plan to use a mixture of ext3 and ext4, this is why i would prefer separate partitions,
if you plan to use ext3 do a boot partition to avoid problerms with grub etc... as other pointed out /boot / and /home are more than enough
